page.title: 10 EDUCATION...ACTIVITIES
page.content: During the Summer Term we have the opportuniy to take part in lots of extra activities. Apart from cricket, rounders and Danish Longball, the older children can play Short Tennis. We swim in our own heated pool, have a Gala and practise athletics for our Sports Day near the end of term. The Fourth Years go to Derbyshire for a week's camping at the County's farm site....the first time some will have been away from home without their parents ! The last event of the term is our P.T.A. Summer Concert. This is always a special family occasion when parents, children and staff make music together. Some of us perform dances and, this year, we listened to the First Performance of a Rhapsody for 'Cello and Piano. The final item is our specially composed 'School Song'.
